attributes.action: stop all slaughter in the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to stop all slaughter and abuse . My reason being it is a horrible habit and is not right. I Know slaughtering is a job for many people and pays good money. But money isnt ment to be made by killing animals. Slaughter isn't right! Please Act Now To Stop Slaughter!

think of animals being free and then think of animals being led to there death!!!!!!

its your choice please help me try to stop it!!!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
